General.Name: M3 Metals Corp
General.Description: M3 Metals Corp. engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral properties in North America. The company explores for gold, copper, iron, molybdenum, and silver deposits. The company was formerly known as ML Gold Corp. and changed its name to M3 Metals Corp. in July 2019. M3 Metals Corp. was incorporated in 2007 and is headquartered in West Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 300-1455 Bellevue Avenue, West Vancouver, BC, Canada, V7T 1C3
